title: Bullied to the Max
description:
The gang is excited to see the new Top Gun Maverick movie and in preparation, Jay showed Christine the original over the weekend. After seeing some particularly intense bullying on Stranger Things, callers are asked to give their own stories of bullying!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayOakerson.com
